an6.55:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
an6.55:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sono rajagahe viharati sitavanasmim.
an6.55:1.4: Atha kho ayasmato sonassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
an6.55:1.5: “ye kho keci bhagavato savaka araddhaviriya viharanti, aham tesam annataro.
an6.55:1.6: Atha ca pana me na anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati, samvijjanti kho pana me kule bhoga, sakka bhoga ca bhunjitum punnani ca katum.
an6.55:1.7: Yannunaham sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattitva bhoge ca bhunjeyyam punnani ca kareyyan”ti.
an6.55:2.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmato sonassa cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam kho—gijjhakute pabbate antarahito sitavane ayasmato sonassa sammukhe paturahosi.
an6.55:2.3: Ayasmapi kho sono bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an6.55:2.4: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam sonam bhagava etadavoca:
an6.55:3.1: “Nanu te, sona, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
an6.55:3.2: ‘ye kho keci bhagavato savaka araddhaviriya viharanti, aham tesam annataro.
an6.55:3.3: Atha ca pana me na anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati, samvijjanti kho pana me kule bhoga, sakka bhoga ca bhunjitum punnani ca katum.
an6.55:3.4: Yannunaham sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattitva bhoge ca bhunjeyyam punnani ca kareyyan’”ti?
an6.55:4.2: kusalo tvam pubbe agariyabhuto vinaya tantissare”ti?
an6.55:4.4: “Tam kim mannasi, sona, yada te vinaya tantiyo accayata honti, api nu te vina tasmim samaye saravati va hoti kammanna va”ti?
an6.55:5.1: “Tam kim mannasi, sona, yada te vinaya tantiyo atisithila honti, api nu te vina tasmim samaye saravati va hoti kammanna va”ti?
an6.55:6.1: “Yada pana te, sona, vinaya tantiyo na accayata honti natisithila same gune patitthita, api nu te vina tasmim samaye saravati va hoti kammanna va”ti?
an6.55:7.1: “Evamevam kho, sona, accaraddhaviriyam uddhaccaya samvattati, atisithilaviriyam kosajjaya samvattati.
an6.55:7.2: Tasmatiha tvam, sona, viriyasamatham adhitthaha, indriyananca samatam pativijjha, tattha ca nimittam ganhahi”ti.
an6.55:7.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma sono bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.55:7.4: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam sonam imina ovadena ovaditva—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam kho—sitavane antarahito gijjhakute pabbate paturahosi.
an6.55:8.1: Atha kho ayasma sono aparena samayena viriyasamatham adhitthasi, indriyananca samatam pativijjhi, tattha ca nimittam aggahesi.
an6.55:8.2: Atha kho ayasma sono eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
an6.55:8.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
an6.55:8.4: Annataro ca panayasma sono arahatam ahosi.
an6.55:9.1: Atha kho ayasmato sonassa arahattappattassa etadahosi:
an6.55:9.2: “yannunaham yena bhagava tenupasankameyyam; upasankamitva bhagavato santike annam byakareyyan”ti.
an6.55:9.3: Atha kho ayasma sono yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sono bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.55:10.1: “Yo so, bhante, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto, so cha thanani adhimutto hoti—
an6.55:10.2: nekkhammadhimutto hoti, pavivekadhimutto hoti, abyapajjadhimutto hoti, tanhakkhayadhimutto hoti, upadanakkhayadhimutto hoti, asammohadhimutto hoti.
an6.55:11.1: Siya kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa ayasmato evamassa:
an6.55:11.3: Na kho panetam, bhante, evam datthabbam.
an6.55:11.4: Khinasavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitava katakaraniyo karaniyam attano asamanupassanto katassa va paticayam khaya ragassa vitaragatta nekkhammadhimutto hoti, khaya dosassa vitadosatta nekkhammadhimutto hoti, khaya mohassa vitamohatta nekkhammadhimutto hoti.
an6.55:12.1: Siya kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa ayasmato evamassa:
an6.55:12.3: Na kho panetam, bhante, evam datthabbam.
an6.55:12.4: Khinasavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitava katakaraniyo karaniyam attano asamanupassanto katassa va paticayam khaya ragassa vitaragatta pavivekadhimutto hoti, khaya dosassa vitadosatta pavivekadhimutto hoti, khaya mohassa vitamohatta pavivekadhimutto hoti.
an6.55:13.1: Siya kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa ayasmato evamassa:
an6.55:13.3: Na kho panetam, bhante, evam datthabbam.
an6.55:13.4: Khinasavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitava katakaraniyo karaniyam attano asamanupassanto katassa va paticayam khaya ragassa vitaragatta abyapajjadhimutto hoti, khaya dosassa vitadosatta abyapajjadhimutto hoti, khaya mohassa vitamohatta abyapajjadhimutto hoti.
an6.55:14.1: Khaya ragassa vitaragatta tanhakkhayadhimutto hoti, khaya dosassa vitadosatta tanhakkhayadhimutto hoti, khaya mohassa vitamohatta tanhakkhayadhimutto hoti.
an6.55:15.1: Khaya ragassa vitaragatta upadanakkhayadhimutto hoti, khaya dosassa vitadosatta upadanakkhayadhimutto hoti, khaya mohassa vitamohatta upadanakkhayadhimutto hoti.
an6.55:16.1: Khaya ragassa vitaragatta asammohadhimutto hoti, khaya dosassa vitadosatta asammohadhimutto hoti, khaya mohassa vitamohatta asammohadhimutto hoti.
an6.55:17.1: Evam samma vimuttacittassa, bhante, bhikkhuno bhusa cepi cakkhuvinneyya rupa cakkhussa apatham agacchanti, nevassa cittam pariyadiyanti.
an6.55:17.2: Amissikatamevassa cittam hoti thitam anenjappattam vayancassanupassati.
an6.55:17.7: manovinneyya dhamma manassa apatham agacchanti, nevassa cittam pariyadiyanti.
an6.55:17.8: Amissikatamevassa cittam hoti thitam anenjappattam vayancassanupassati.
an6.55:17.9: Seyyathapi, bhante, selo pabbato acchiddo asusiro ekagghano.
an6.55:17.10: Atha puratthimaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi neva nam sankampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya, atha pacchimaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi …
an6.55:17.11: atha uttaraya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi …
an6.55:17.12: atha dakkhinaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi neva nam sankampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya;
an6.55:17.13: evamevam kho, bhante, evam sammavimuttacittassa bhikkhuno bhusa cepi cakkhuvinneyya rupa cakkhussa apatham agacchanti, nevassa cittam pariyadiyanti.
an6.55:17.14: Amissikatamevassa cittam hoti, thitam anenjappattam vayancassanupassati.
an6.55:17.19: manovinneyya dhamma manassa apatham agacchanti, nevassa cittam pariyadiyanti.
an6.55:17.20: Amissikatamevassa cittam hoti thitam anenjappattam vayancassanupassatiti.
